tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneExpressionTracking(
    gene_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    expression_level INT,
    time_recorded TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE GeneExpression (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY, expression_level FLOAT, time TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE GeneInfo (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name TEXT, description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE TimePoints (time_id INT PRIMARY KEY, time TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE GeneExpressionLog (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT, time_id INT, expression_level FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE GeneExpressionStats (stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT, min_expression FLOAT, max_expression FLOAT, avg_expression FLOAT);
